akn:section.akn:heading: Feasibility studies; acceleration; advancement of costs by non-Federal sources

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1962d–6. Feasibility studies; acceleration; advancement of costs by non-Federal sources The Secretary may accelerate feasibility studies authorized by law when and to the extent that the costs of such studies shall have been advanced by non-Federal sources. (Pub. L. 89–561, § 5, Sept. 7, 1966, 80 Stat. 714.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was not enacted as part of the Water Resources Planning Act which comprises this chapter.
